name: Call From Browser
description: Make phone calls from a web browser with Nexmo In-App Voice and Vue.JS.

NEXMO_PRIVATE_KEY.description: A path to a private key or the full text of a private key

NEXMO_APP_ID.description: The ID of the Nexmo Application associated with this web app

NEXMO_APP_USER_NAME.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

NEXMO_FROM_NUMBER.description: A Nexmo virtual number to be set if the outbound call is to have a visible 'from' number to the caller
